titleInfo.title: General store records from Washington, Tennessee

mods.note: These are seven pages of accounts and purchases from a general store in Washington, Tennessee in 1869. Items bought include: tobacco, umbrellas, cloth, salt, flour, and sugar, among many other items. It is not clear whether this ledger is from Washington, Tennessee, a city that does not exist anymore or Washington County. The ledger is located in Dayton, Tennessee which is a few hundred miles from Washington County, Tennessee.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
